data.name: Primal Carnage: Extinction Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A Jurassic-sized collection of all music from Primal Carnage and Primal Carnage: Extinction, this original soundtrack features dozens of pulse-pounding pieces created for both games.

A hybrid fusion of classical and electronica, the score was created by maestro composers Gareth Coker & Zach Lemmon (ARK: Survival Evolved, Ori and the Blind Forest).

Newly updated with bonus tracks including the action-packed score for Survival mode!
*All tracks are presented in MP3 Format at 320 Kbps.

Download location:
Steam / steamapps / music / Primal Carnage Extinction Soundtrack

data.short_description: A Jurassic-sized OST featuring ALL of the music from Primal Carnage and Primal Carnage: Extinction!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+ Single-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+ Multi-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
